classes.description: A segmented portion of text from a scraped webpage.

properties.name: key
properties.description: The identifier for the text chunk.

properties.name: text
properties.description: The content of the text chunk.

classes.description: Details of a specific webpage scraped during a session.

properties.name: pageURL
properties.description: The specific URL of the scraped webpage.

properties.name: chunks
properties.description: Segmented content chunks from the scraped page.

classes.description: Represents a specific scrape event at a certain timestamp.

properties.name: timestamp
properties.description: The date and time when the scrape session occurred.

classes.description: Represents a website which can have multiple scrape sessions.

properties.name: scrapeSessions
properties.description: The scrape sessions associated with the website.
